thread.title: Liverpool quiz! Can you name the 19 players given their Reds debut under Jurgen Klopp?
thread.title_full: Liverpool quiz! Can you name the 19 players given their Reds debut under Jurgen Klopp?

author: Mark Jones
title: Liverpool quiz! Can you name the 19 players given their Reds debut under Jurgen Klopp?
text:
Sport Liverpool quiz! Can you name the 19 players given their Reds debut under Jurgen Klopp? The German boss has made sweeping changes at Anfield since joining in October 2015, but can you name the players he gave a first appearance to? Share Harry Wilson almost marked his debut with a goal (Photo: Reuters) Share Get Liverpool FC updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Liverpool scraped past a determined Plymouth Argyle to make it through to the fourth round of the FA Cup, but not without a fight. 
The Reds survived against a determined League Two outfit, progressing via a 1-0 win thanks to a rare Lucas Leiva goal in the first half. 
In the second period, Jurgen Klopp threw on Welsh youngster Harry Wilson as his side sought another goal, with the teenager becoming the latest in a long line of players given their first Reds appearance by the Liverpool manager. You're not quite a wizard, Harry (Photo: Dan Mullan) Jurgen Klopp before the game at Home Park (Photo: REUTERS) 
But can you name the rest of them? 
There are 19 players in all, and we'll give you four minutes to write their names in the space below. 
Remember to tweet us your score at @MirrorRowZed . 
Ready? Go!
